body_html: Reading https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/lib/io/file_io.py#L252, it says errors.OpError: If there are filesystem / directory listing errors. So the above error is supposed to happen, if I interpret this correctly. However, it should not, as the listing error is concerned with a directory tensorflow has no business in dealing with.
body_text: Reading https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/lib/io/file_io.py#L252, it says errors.OpError: If there are filesystem / directory listing errors. So the above error is supposed to happen, if I interpret this correctly. However, it should not, as the listing error is concerned with a directory tensorflow has no business in dealing with.
body: Reading https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/lib/io/file_io.py#L252, it says `errors.OpError: If there are filesystem / directory listing errors.` So the above error is supposed to happen, if I interpret this correctly. However, it should not, as the `listing error` is concerned with a directory `tensorflow` has no business in dealing with.
